comment.author: 93699712@N05
comment._content: I have an original photograph of this aircraft - "Twin Nifties II".  It was taken in November 1943 at Dobodura, New Guinea, while assigned to the 400th Bombardment Squadron, 90th Bombardment Group, 5th Army Air Force.  Why it was labeled "7th Air Force", especially since we did not have an "Air Force" at that time, I  do not know.  I'm thinking one might wish to regard the labeling of these photos with just a bit of skepticism; and where errors are found, kindly post the correct data.
